content:
d unwanted implica-
tions. This might force clarification and modification. But the most important
service that logical analysis can perform is to lay bare the fundamental princi-
ples that lie beneath surface disagreements. Analysis will sometimes show that
these disagreements are fundamental and perhaps irreconcilable. Dealing with
such  irreconcilable  differences  in  a  humane  way  is  one  of  the  fundamental
tasks of a society dedicated to freedom and a wide range of civil liberties.
